mapper.select: /* PhcfMenuManageDAO.selectMenuInfoDetail */ SELECT DEPTH1_NUMBER, DEPTH2_NUMBER, DEPTH3_NUMBER, PAGE, MENU_NAME, LINK FROM MENUINFOLIST WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_CODE = #{MENU_CODE}
mapper.insert: /* PhcfMenuManageDAO.insertNewMenuReg */ INSERT INTO MENUINFOLIST(DEPTH1_NUMBER, DEPTH2_NUMBER, DEPTH3_NUMBER, PAGE, MENU_NAME, LINK, NEW_PAGE) VALUES (#{DEPTH1_NUMBER},#{DEPTH2_NUMBER},#{DEPTH3_NUMBER}, #{PAGE}, #{MENU_NAME},#{LINK}, #{NEW_PAGE})
